header: display: flex; align-items: center; width: 100%; max-width: 1920px; min-height: 100px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 1em 2em; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px var(--color-gray-dark);
logo-image: max-width: 50px; max-height: 50px; aspect-ratio: 1; user-select: none; -webkit-user-select: none; -webkit-user-drug: none;
logo-caption: font-family: var(--font-kanit); font-weight: 700; font-size: 22px; color: var(--color-blue); user-select: none; -webkit-user-select: none;
page-heading: font-family: var(--font-kanit); font-weight: 700; font-size: 35px; color: var(--color-blue); user-select: none; -webkit-user-select: none;
converter-wrapper: display: flex; flex-direction: column; row-gap: 1em; width: 100%; max-width: 900px; height: 490px; padding: 1.5em; background-color: var(--color-blue-alpha); border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: -13px 20px 6px var(--color-blue); overflow-y: auto;
rate-switch-label: font-family: var(--font-kanit); font-weight: 500; font-size: 27px; color: var(--color-blue); user-select: none; -webkit-user-select: none;
rate-switch: font-family: var(--font-kanit); font-weight: 500; font-size: 16px; color: var(--color-white); width: 100%; max-width: 400px; padding: 0.7em; border: none; outline: none; overflow: hidden; background-color: var(--color-blue); border-radius: 7px; user-select: none; -webkit-user-select: none; cursor: pointer;
select-option: font-family: var(--font-kanit); font-weight: 500; font-size: 16px; color: var(--color-white);
currency-container: display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; padding: 1em; background-color: var(--color-gray-light); border-radius: 15px;
flag-image: width: 100%; max-width: 35px; max-height: 35px; aspect-ratio: 1; user-select: none; -webkit-user-select: none; -webkit-user-drag: none;
currency-name: font-family: var(--font-kanit); font-weight: 500; font-size: 20px; color: var(--color-blue); user-select: none; -webkit-user-select: none;
currency-rate: font-family: var(--font-kanit); font-weight: 500; font-size: 20px; color: var(--color-blue); user-select: none; -webkit-user-select: none;
converter-label: font-family: var(--font-kanit); font-weight: 500; font-size: 20px; color: var(--color-blue); user-select: none; -webkit-user-select: none;
converter-select: font-family: var(--font-kanit); font-weight: 500; font-size: 16px; color: var(--color-white); width: 100%; padding: 0.7em; border: none; outline: none; overflow: hidden; background-color: var(--color-blue); border-radius: 7px; user-select: none; -webkit-user-select: none; cursor: pointer;
converter-input: font-family: var(--font-kanit); font-weight: 500; font-size: 16px; color: var(--color-black); width: 100%; padding: 0.7em; border: none; outline: none; overflow: hidden; background-color: var(--color-white); border-radius: 7px; user-select: none; -webkit-user-select: none;
switch-icon: width: 100%; maw-width: 35px; max-height: 35px; aspect-ratio: 1; user-select: none; -webkit-user-select: none; -webkit-user-drag: none; cursor: pointer;
